CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper December 19, 1959, pg. A3, reads: "Art Exhibit - Ronald Green shows his homeroom teacher, Mrs. Mamie Wadkins, the painting he drew in the art room at Herron Junior High School.  The painting now is on display in the school cafeteria. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Ronald Green and teacher Mamie Wadkins standing beside Green's painting of baseball players, in Herron Junior High School cafeteria
